edges.label: 1. Investigation Conducted
edges.tooltip: The Office of Internal Oversight Services conducted the investigation into the allegations.

edges.label: 2. Investigation Target
edges.tooltip: The investigation focused on allegations concerning a Senior Official at UNMIL.

edges.label: 3. Allegations Against
edges.tooltip: The case involved allegations of conflict of interest and abuse of authority by Senior Official 1.

Senior Official 1: Involvement in business dealings with a businessman in Liberia.
Abuse of authority for personal or third-party benefit.
